title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historic Site: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Fallen Timbers Battlefield US 24 & Jerome, Maumee, Ohio 43537 (419) 407-9700  From the battlefield continue to Fallen Timbers State Memorial in Monclova Township, Ohio - Head SW on US 24 W - Take the exit toward Jerome Road/Stitt Road - Turn left onto County Road 2089/Fallen Timbers Lane - Take the third right onto State Park Roa From the battlefield continue to Fort Miamis State Memorial in Maumee, Ohio - Head SW on US 24 W - Take the exit toward Jerome Road/Stitt Road - Turn left onto County Road 2089/Fallen Timbers Lane - Merge onto US 24 E via the ramp to Toledo - Turn right onto Key Street - Turn left onto River Road - Take the second right onto Corey Street
